caption.title: Strengths and limitations of this study

list-item.p: A strength of this study is that it will apply a broad review of multidisciplinary databases covering medicine, health, education and the environment, providing a comprehensive assessment of published literature on courses designed on these subjects.

A limitation of this study is that only peer-reviewed literature in English will be included, which will limit the scope of this review to articles published in English speaking countries or to those who published in English.
A limitation of this study is that identified publications will not be subject to quality appraisal.
